stem: Which of the following is a well-known cause of Waterhouse-Friderichsen syndrome?
disc: Waterhouse-Friderichsen refers to adrenal hemorrhage associated most commonly with meningococcal septicemia. It is also associated with the rest of the organisms mentioned here. It results in acute adrenal insufficiency.
tags: Medicine, Infectious Disease, Meningoccal Infection, Adrenal Insufficiency
